alert.note: Alert for Central Chaffee County Below 9000 Ft; Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Chaffee County above 9000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 14 at 11:10AM MST until February 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sawatch Mountains and Chaffee county. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Chaffee County Below 9000 Ft; Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Chaffee County above 9000Ft
